article_title: Three running for 11th District Senate seat

article_metadata.description: CHESTERFIELD — Incumbent Sen. Stephen H. Martin, R-Colonial Heights, will have twice the competition this year as he runs for the 11th District Senate seat against Amanda Chase and Barry F. Moore Jr. All three candidates are business owners who hope to use their knowledge in running their businesses to change the politics of the 11th district.
article_metadata.author: Amir Vera Staff Writer

og.description: CHESTERFIELD — Incumbent Sen. Stephen H. Martin, R-Colonial Heights, will have twice the competition this year as he runs for the 11th District
